short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the predicted score when watching live football football live streams free
short.vi: Tính tỉ số dự đoán khi xem trực tiếp bóng đá football live streams free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the football live streams free Chrome app! mbscore.tv... This application helps you as a troll application to give random scores of matches like FC Bayern München vs TSG Hoffenheim, Burnley vs Luton Town, Chelsea vs Fulham, Newcastle United vs Manchester City, and many other matches.

Setting :

Open Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "football live streams free" in the search box. 
Select the "football live streams free" widget and press the "Install" button.

Use:

Select the match you want to see fun predictions for from the list of available matches.
